description: KinkMen is proud to present this week, the prequel to the The Cabin. In this dark tale, Tatum finds out that his best friend and business partner Morgan is unable to make it to the cabin for their usual weekend romantic rendezvous because Morgan is busy with his wife. Instead, Morgan's son Kip will be there with some hippy friends. Fantasizing about Kip, Tatum rushes off to the cabin and can't help but creep on Kip as he's taking a shower. Tatum soon finds out little Kip is all grown up and has a very dark side.
title: The Cabin Series #1 - The Best Friend's Son
